verbs.description: aside 400 bags of rice fg [V: has] done nothing for bayelsa flood victims says dickson other than receiving about 400 bags of rice for thousands of displaced people i can not point to any concrete help the federal government has rendered no cash support not even in 2012 did the state government receive any monies from the federal government i know that we raised some money on our own and some agencies and philanthropic individuals and companies came to our rescue dickson said bayelsa state sahara reporters flood federal government governor seriake dickson federal government of the united states
